thread.title: Arulnithi’s next titled Aaraadhu Sinam! | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: Arulnithi’s next titled Aaraadhu Sinam! | Deccan Chronicle

author: Deccan
title: Arulnithi’s next titled Aaraadhu Sinam! | Deccan Chronicle
text: Deccan Chronicle | S Subhakeerthana | October 14, 2015, 07.19 am Aishwarya Rajesh The movie, which has Arulnithi in the Tamil remake of Jeethu Joseph’s Malayalam film Memories, which had Prithviraj in the lead role, has been titled Aaraadhu Sinam. Directed by Arivazhagan of Eeram fame, Aaraadhu Sinam has Aishwarya Rajesh and Aishwarya Dutta as the female leads. We hear that the shooting of the project is currently progressing at a brisk pace and Arulnithi will be playing a cop in it. Sources say Aishwarya Rajesh plays Arulnithi’s wife in the film and recently the crew has finished canning a wedding sequence in a hall in the city. Sources close to the director say Arivazhagan will be adapting the film in his own style for the Tamil audiences. The original story revolves around the story of a drunkard policeman, who investigates a series of murders. Speaking to DC, Aishwarya Rajesh confirmed her inclusion in the film, and said that she is in talks for a couple of other films as well. “But I haven’t signed the dotted line. My other projects include Hello Naan Pei Pesuren and the Tamil remake of Jolly LLB,” says Aishwarya.
